page.title: 08 POPULATION AND HOUSING (1)
page.content: In this area 4.099 square Kms of the 12 square Kms is used as urban land excluding industrial use. This means that just over{one third of the} {land is covered by housing.} Population is fairly evenly distributed but there are larger housing areas such as the British Legion Village (7257) to the N.W of Maidstone, Allington (7457) and directly North of the town are Sandling (7558) and Ringlestone (7557) Maidstone itself is a large town but with more people choosing to live on its outskirts,since communications are good.The London road leads North to Allington, which has a fairly large community with a population of about 10,000. Younger families with small children tend to live on the newer estates where the housing is modern, mostly semi-detached and with easy
